name: Pavel Slajnev

hasOccupation.name: Head of Automation, Measurement, and Control Systems Service
responsibilities: Coordination of modernization and automation projects.
Development of internal applications for process optimization.
Administration and maintenance of automated systems and industrial equipment.
Participation in IT and electrical infrastructure modernization.
Technical team management and collaboration with IT service providers.
Management and optimization of the institution's automated systems, including implementation of modern access control, video surveillance, and parking automation solutions.
Development of internal applications for efficient IT resource and operational process management, including integration with IT inventory monitoring and management systems.
Development of a time management program for employees, including integration with access control and video surveillance systems for attendance and activity monitoring.
Design of data transport systems and computer networks, including implementation of network security and monitoring solutions.
Collaboration with subcontractors and suppliers for IT infrastructure solutions, including managing relationships with equipment and IT service providers.
Sourcing necessary equipment and tools on the local market, including price and delivery negotiations.
Preparation of procurement plans for equipment and tools needed for efficient service operation, including budget and financial resource management.
Reviewing offers and participating as a specialist in public procurement committees, including evaluation of technical and commercial offers from suppliers.
Management of construction and installation works for IT infrastructure, including coordination of worker and subcontractor teams to ensure quality.

Inspection upon receipt of construction and installation works for IT infrastructure, ensuring compliance with technical specifications and quality standards, as well as managing any non-conformities and additional work volumes.

hasOccupation.name: Computer Network Technician

Development of custom IT solutions.
Implementation of access control, video surveillance, and IP telephony systems.
Technical support for computers, servers, cloud/containerization solutions.
Effective collaboration with development teams for IT system integration.
Automation of administrative and operational tasks using scripts (PowerShell, VBA, Bash, CMD, etc.) for OS installation, service management, and rapid resolution of recurring incidents.

hasOccupation.name: Electrical Technician
responsibilities: Installation, maintenance, and repair of low-voltage electrical installations.
Modernization of electrical infrastructure.
